programme.title: Penguins: Meet The Family
programme.desc: A stunning celebration of an iconic bird. Travelling all around the southern hemisphere, this special programme sets out to introduce the whole remarkable penguin family. Most people imagine penguins huddled in a snowy world, but there's much more to them than that. Penguins can be found in deserts, tropical jungles and even bustling cities. From tiny fairy penguins - just 30 centimetres high - to giant emperors, the penguin extended family is full of surprises.
